Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_ci" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add roadmap and AI productivity documentation

- Added Roadmap section to README with completed/planned features
- Created docs/AI_PRODUCTIVITY.md documenting development session

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_web" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add middleware docs to README, update AI productivity report

- Added middleware pipeline documentation with examples
- Added built-in middleware docs (logging, CORS, auth)
- Added custom middleware creation guide
- Added roadmap section with completed/planned features
- Updated AI_PRODUCTIVITY.md with Session 2 (middleware) stats

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\reference_docs\eiffel" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Windows cmd patterns, middleware patterns, collection gotchas

- Added simple_ci usage documentation to CLAUDE_CONTEXT.md
- Added Windows command execution gotchas (cmd /c, set syntax)
- Added ARRAYED_LIST.has reference equality gotcha
- Added inline agent local variable limitation gotcha
- Added middleware pipeline pattern to patterns.md
- Added Windows env var command pattern
- Added value equality check pattern for collections

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(SIMPLE_JSON="D:/prod/simple_json" TESTING_EXT="D:/prod/testing_ext" SIMPLE_SQL="D:/prod/simple_sql" SIMPLE_PROCESS="D:/prod/simple_process" SIMPLE_RANDOMIZER="D:/prod/simple_randomizer" "C:\Program Files\Eiffel Software\EiffelStudio 25.02 Standard\studio\spec\win64\bin\ec.exe":*)

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_web" add README.md src/server/middleware/simple_web_auth_middleware.e src/server/middleware/simple_web_cors_middleware.e src/server/simple_web_server_request.e src/server/simple_web_sanitizer.e testing/server/test_sanitizer.e)

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_web" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add input sanitization and security improvements

Security features:
- Add SIMPLE_WEB_SANITIZER class with XSS, path traversal, header
  injection, SQL, and JSON sanitization methods
- Add safe_path_parameter and safe_query_parameter to request class
- Fix ARRAYED_LIST.has reference equality in CORS and auth middleware
- Add comprehensive tests for sanitizer (15 tests)

Documentation:
- Add Security section to README with sanitization examples
- Add security recommendations for production use
- Update roadmap with completed security features

Addresses security concerns from Grok code review.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\reference_docs\eiffel" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Expand Code Review Hat with deep-dive capabilities

- Added web research capability (OWASP, best practices, library docs)
- Added review workflow (Scope, Read, Research, Analyze, Report)
- Added Eiffel-specific checklist (void safety, DbC, ARRAYED_LIST.has)
- Added security checklist (injection, auth, secrets)
- Added severity levels (Critical, High, Medium, Low)
- Added output format template for structured findings

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(SIMPLE_JSON="D:/prod/simple_json" SIMPLE_PROCESS="D:/prod/simple_process" SIMPLE_SQL="D:/prod/simple_sql" TESTING_EXT="D:/prod/testing_ext" "C:\Program Files\Eiffel Software\EiffelStudio 25.02 Standard\studio\spec\win64\bin\ec.exe":*)
Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_web" add README.md simple_web.ecf src/todo_api/ testing/todo_api/)

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_json" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add friction-free JSON helper methods and serialization pattern

- Add has_all_keys, has_any_key, missing_keys for multi-field validation
- Add integer_32_item, natural_32_item for direct type coercion
- Add optional_string, optional_integer, optional_boolean for optional fields
- Create SIMPLE_JSON_SERIALIZABLE deferred class for entity serialization
- Update README with entity serialization example and convenience features

These features reduce API friction when working with JSON in web applications.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_web" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Todo API mock demonstrating simple_json friction fixes

- Create TODO_WEB_API_SERVER with full REST endpoints
- Document friction points F1-F8 and their resolutions
- Use new friction-free features: has_all_keys, integer_32_item, optional_string
- Add test_todo_api.e with 9 tests
- Add todo_api and todo_api_tests ECF targets
- Update README: 95 tests, add todo API to completed features

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\reference_docs\eiffel" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add JSON serialization patterns from friction-fixing session

- Add SIMPLE_JSON_SERIALIZABLE entity pattern
- Add friction-free JSON field handling examples
- Document has_all_keys, integer_32_item, optional_string patterns

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "D:\prod\simple_gui_designer" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: HTMX-based GUI specification designer

Features:
- Visual drag-and-drop canvas with 12-column grid
- Control types: heading, label, text_field, text_area, button,
  dropdown, checkbox, date_picker, table, link, card, tabs
- Container controls with nested children
- Multi-screen support
- Properties panel for editing control attributes
- Import/Export JSON specifications
- Finalize workflow for production specs

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
